items.sentence: Tom can speak French almost as well as Mary.
Tom can speak French much better than I can.
Tom can stay with us as long as he wants to.
Tom put Mary\'s drawing on the refrigerator.
I don\'t remember when this photo was taken.
Tom died from an overdose of sleeping pills.
Why should we do what Tom says we should do?
Why would Tom lie about something like that?
Why would anybody live in a place like this?
Why would anyone think that was a good idea?
I\'ll never forget how helpful you\'ve been.
Why didn\'t you just tell me about all this?
Tom hardly ever kisses his children anymore.
Tom has a good job in the computer industry.
You never know how long it\'s going to last.
You obviously haven\'t seen what Tom can do.
You really do hate your ex-wife, don\'t you?
Tom doesn\'t think it\'s such a big problem.
Tom doesn\'t want to answer Mary\'s message.
You shouldn\'t associate with men like that.
